name: com.umcp.unity-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation for Unity Editor, enabling AI assistants to interact with Unity projects in real-time. Features 21 built-in tools, Markdown-based workflow system, and intelligent action suggestions. Supports asset management, console logs, test execution, project analysis, and context-aware workflow guidance. Requires UniTask.

samples.description: Basic MCP tool examples and configurations
